title: Colt Ford - Thanks for Listening   2014
description:
Colt Ford debuted the world premiere of his latest lyric video, "Thanks for Listening" exclusively on headlinecountry.com today (6/11). The song features Daniel Lee and is the title track from Colt's upcoming album.
